meta.appName: Kurt Lourens: Software Engineer - Red Ruby IT Co-Owner
meta.title: Kurt Lourens: Software Engineer - Red Ruby IT Co-Owner
meta.description: Kurt Lourens CV Website. Red Ruby IT Co-Owner. South African Software Engineer in The Netherlands. Lists Experiences, Certificates and Career Development.

subtitle: Beautiful and fast cross-platform apps built to help you in your favourite games!
additionalDescription: Working on these projects has opened up opportunities to talk to other community developers, host streams and start organisations all aimed at entertaining and assisting gamers enjoy their games to the fullest!!
footerDescription: Feel free to get in contact with us! we have a Discord server if you would like to talk directly to us. Otherwise you can use the form below and we will get back to you as soon as we can.

assistantAppsMeta.title: Assistant Apps by Kurt Lourens
assistantAppsMeta.description: Home page of the Assistant Apps. Get the apps on Google Play, Apple App Store and on the web

assistantApps.title: Assistant for No Man's Sky
assistantApps.description: The first of the Assistant apps! This app was relased on the 12th of August 2019 and reached 40 000 active users on Android 1 year later. The app is available on Android, iOS and a simplified version is available for Web

assistantApps.title: Assistant for Scrap Mechanic
assistantApps.description: The Assistant for Scrap Mechanic app would not have been started if the developers of the game did not make it easy for modders to look at and edit the game's files. This made reading the game files a lot easier than No Man's Sky and helped in completing this project in a short period of time (2-3 weeks part time). This is also the first completely open source project.

assistantApps.title: Assistant for Unknown
assistantApps.description: Yet another Assistant app is under development. Can you guess what game it will be about? Let us know what you think we are working on üòÅ
